name: AvaxPad
highlight: Bring high revenue to participants through providing liquidity for the DEFI protocol. We create a quick, safe and effective platform with features for Farming, Staking, Launchpad, Mining, NFT market..
summary: Avaxpad Protocol is decentralized finance chain with high performance, built on the Avalanche network. With the ecosystem we created, it will be highly profitable for the public chain and to provide community users with a faster, more convenient and low-cost experience with the features as Farming, Staking, Launchpad, Mining, NFT market.
